abstract: Otto F Warmbier, University of Virginia student who has been detained by North Korean officials since January for trying to steal hotel banner, apologizes for his 'antistate' crime at news conference in Pyongyang.
lead_paragraph: It remained unclear whether the student, who has been in custody since Jan. 2, was coerced to say that he had stolen a political banner from his hotel.

headline.main: Otto Warmbier, Detained U.S. Student, Apologizes in North Korea
headline.print_headline: Student Held in North Korea Apologizes

snippet: It remained unclear whether the student, who has been in custody since Jan. 2, was coerced to say that he had stolen a political banner from his hotel.
